NAV

15 December

The Details

Getting There

The nearest MRT station is the Nicoll Highway (CC5) station. Upon alighting take exit A.

The bus stop directly outside the hotel (B01529) has services, 961, 980, 100, 107M and 107.

The hotel carpark. Please remember to claim the complimentary parking ticket at the reception.

Sharing The Moment

We are certain you will be snapping really nice pictures of the event and yourselves. Do share them with us by using this tag.
